snippet: King Abdullah of Jordan accepted the resignation of the interior minister and the government dismissed the chief of police over reported abuses in prisons and the mishandling of a crackdown in the south.
abstract: King Abdullah of Jordan accepts resignation of Interior Min Hussein al-Majali and government dismisses chief of police following reports of torture in prisons and brutal police crackdown in tribal city Maan.
lead_paragraph: King Abdullah of Jordan accepted the resignation of the interior minister and the government dismissed the chief of police over reported abuses in prisons and the mishandling of a crackdown in the south.

headline.main: Jordan: Top Officials Are Forced Out
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Jordan: Top Officials Are Forced Out
